argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | erclwwlkn.w | |- W = ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) |
| 2 |  | erclwwlkn.r | |- .~ = { <. t , u >. | ( t e. W /\ u e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) t = ( u cyclShift n ) ) } |
| 3 |  | #P_df-3an | |- ( ( x e. W /\ x e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) <-> ( ( x e. W /\ x e. W ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_anidm | |- ( ( x e. W /\ x e. W ) <-> x e. W ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( ( x e. W /\ x e. W ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) <-> ( x e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 5 | #P_bitri | |- ( ( x e. W /\ x e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) <-> ( x e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 8 | 1, 2 | #P_erclwwlkneq | |- ( ( x e. _V /\ x e. _V ) -> ( x .~ x <-> ( x e. W /\ x e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 7, 8 | #P_mp2an | |- ( x .~ x <-> ( x e. W /\ x e. W /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_clwwlknprop | |- ( x e. ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) -> ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ x e. Word V /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ ( # ` x ) = N ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_cshw0 | |- ( x e. Word V -> ( x cyclShift 0 ) = x ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ x e. Word V /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ ( # ` x ) = N ) ) -> ( x cyclShift 0 ) = x ) |
| 13 |  | #P_0elfz | |- ( N e. NN0 -> 0 e. ( 0 ... N ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ ( # ` x ) = N ) -> 0 e. ( 0 ... N ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ x e. Word V /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ ( # ` x ) = N ) ) -> 0 e. ( 0 ... N ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqcom | |- ( ( x cyclShift 0 ) = x <-> x = ( x cyclShift 0 ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_biimpi | |- ( ( x cyclShift 0 ) = x -> x = ( x cyclShift 0 ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( n = 0 -> ( x cyclShift n ) = ( x cyclShift 0 ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( n = 0 -> ( x = ( x cyclShift n ) <-> x = ( x cyclShift 0 ) ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( 0 e. ( 0 ... N ) /\ x = ( x cyclShift 0 ) ) -> E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) |
| 21 | 15, 17, 20 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ x e. Word V /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ ( # ` x ) = N ) ) /\ ( x cyclShift 0 ) = x ) -> E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) |
| 22 | 12, 21 | #P_mpdan | |- ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ x e. Word V /\ ( N e. NN0 /\ ( # ` x ) = N ) ) -> E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) x = ( x cyclShift n ) ) |
